entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:07 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 12:54 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: NE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy. Local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023
